title: Mad Games Tycoon v0.150410A
description:
Information: Old save games can not be loaded. 

- 11 new objects added.
- New room added: Quality Assurance
- AddOns now give extra points for graphics, art, sound and gameplay.
- Added new difficulty (Legendary).
- Credit limit and interest rates are dependent on the difficulty.
- Selected employees now have an outline.
- Buy objects: Now you can open and close the object categories.
- Employees now go to the sound system and dance.
- A message box appears if you have not set all skill points at game start.
- Added Dutch language.
- Different languages have been updated.
- Bug removed: Unreleased Games were displayed at marketing campaign as "1979".
- Bug removed: Problems with tooltips have been fixed
